articles.title: Twitter erupts as Mehidy Hasan Miraz & Najmul Hossain Shanto steer Bangladesh to a dominant win against Afghanistan – Asia Cup 2023 - Cricket Times
articles.description: In a high-octane encounter at the Gaddafi Stadium, Bangladesh emerged victorious over Afghanistan by a substantial margin of 89 runs in the fourth match of the Asia Cup 2023. The contest, marked by exemplary batting performances and spirited bowling, showcase…

articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: Jasprit Bumrah to miss Nepal game, returns to Mumbai due to personal reasons: Reports - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Cricket News: India’s pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah has returned to Mumbai and will miss the Asia Cup 2023 match against Nepal scheduled on Monday in Pallekele. Alt
